articles.content: NORTH Melbourne youngster Jy Simpkin has cemented his place as a future Kangaroos captain, celebrating a career-best season with his first ever Syd Barker Medal as the club's best and fairest on Frid… [+2112 chars]

articles.title: AFL announces compensation for Mabior Chol and Jake Kelly - SEN
articles.description: “It can be wherever they want.”
articles.content:
The AFL has announced Richmond will receive an end of round two selection in the 2021 AFL draft as compensation for free agent Mabior Chol.
